quote_first: “So you deduce that I arrived at the fallen tree later than
quote_last: It may have been so. As I wasn’t concocting an alibi, I didn’t check the time every two minutes.”
title: Shroud for a Nightingale
author: P.D. James

quote_first: Kava ordered two glasses of coffee for himself and his beloved and some cake. When the pair left, exactly
quote_last: , the club began to buzz with excitement.
title: Vanvild Kava
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
